response.overview: In late eighties, in Ceausescu's Romania, a black market VHS bootlegger and a courageous female translator brought the magic of Western films to the Romanian people and sowed the seeds of a revolution.
response.title: Chuck Norris vs Communism

release_dates.note: Kharkiv MeetDocs Eastern Ukrainian Film Festival

results.name: In The Can: Chuck Norris v. Communism
VHS vs. Communism: In Romania, a Voice of Freedom
